cleaned_text: Illustrations, I have been doing for Ruth Erne and her new book on the "Torffaser-Impuls" ( turf fiber ), which has been started by Rudolf Steiner back in the 20s and 30s of the last century, but continued by only a few. One of them is Ruth Erne who has been doing an incredible work in the past 30 years by working with turf fibers, refining them by using natural ingredients, coloring them with natural colours, spinning and weaving them, in order to produce unique and healthy clothing. She lives and works in Hettenschwil AG in Switzerland. The book is going to be published in decembre 2016 by the "Verlagsbuchhandlung Beer" in Zurich, Switzerland ISBN 978-85568-001-6 All of the drawings have been done in Octobre 2016, pencil on paper, tiny fromats [25th November](https://irmanova.tumblr.com/post/153642400264/illustrations-i-have-been-doing-for-ruth-erne-and)1 note [segalegend](https://segalegend.tumblr.com/)liked this [irmanova](https://irmanova.tumblr.com/)posted this
